name: Lift: Medical Student Peer Support and Resilience Skills
name_original: Lift: Medical Student Peer Support and Resilience Skills
description: In Lift: Medical Student Peer Support and Resilience Skills, the player is a 4th-year medical student on their first day on rotation at an Outpatient clinic. The player chooses how to respond to others within their clinical environment to learn how they can help their peers and themselves have a better clinical training experience.
